name: The Dead in my Living Room
name_original: The Dead in my Living Room
description:
As Jack awoke one night from uneasy dreams, a corpse was lying in front of him on the floor of his living room...

What had happened?

CONTROLS FOR WEB PLAYER AND MOST EMULATORS:

  • LEFT (A/Left arrow)
  • UP (W/Up Arrow)
  • DOWN (S/Down Arrow)
  • RIGHT (D/Right Arrow)
  • A (ALT Key)
  • B (CTRL Key)
  • START (ENTER key)
  • SELECT (SHIFT key)

If you like the game and want to talk about it on twitter:

@arts_meteor
@TheDeadInMyLiv1

I am happy to hear from you! :-)
